div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1352 Bodrum (anc. Halicarnassus), Caria, (477) 1888 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. Contents: 8 AR, c. 20 AE Halicarnassus: 2 dr. (as BMC 43 ff.) c. 20 AE. (as BMC 20 ff.) Myndus: 6 dr. (as BMC 1 ff.) Disposition: dispersed Paton, NC 1890, pp. 279 f.
